text: Mathew Allan Leckie (born 4 February 1991) is an Australian soccer player. He plays for Melbourne City in the A-League Men and for the Australia men's national soccer team (nicknamed the "Socceroos"). Leckie is a fast and quick- moving player. He usually plays on the wing. But in the past, he has also played as a midfielder, a striker or second striker, and sometimes even as a wing-back. ==References== Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Australian men's soccer players Category:Soccer players from Melbourne Category:2014 FIFA World Cup players Category:2018 FIFA World Cup players Category:2022 FIFA World Cup players
title: Mathew Leckie
